channel.title: [PI] help changing drop rates
channel.description:
I need help changing the PI npc drop rate codes instead of the regular
monsterid:rarity item:amount item:amount
I want to know if i can change it to
monster id | item | amount | rarity
so i can individual put drop rates for each monster.

item.title: [PI] help changing drop rates
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
